short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and graph voltages over a serial connection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monitor voltage from multiple points simultaneously with nothing but that Arduino you've got lying around.

- Supports up to 16 inputs from a single device
- Graph updates and scrolls in real-time
- Comes with an example sketch to get you started

Use this app to debug and discover what's really happening on your breadboard!
